scripts.create: . env-setup.sh && fcli function create --service-name ${SERVICE_NAME} --function-name ${FUNCTION_NAME} --handler dist/index.handler --runtime nodejs8 --code-dir .
scripts.update: . env-setup.sh && fcli function update --service-name ${SERVICE_NAME} --function-name ${FUNCTION_NAME} --handler dist/index.handler --runtime nodejs8 --code-dir .
scripts.trigger-create: . env-setup.sh && fcli trigger create --service-name ${SERVICE_NAME} --function-name ${FUNCTION_NAME} --trigger-name ${TRIGGER_NAME} --type timer --config timeTrigger.yml
scripts.live-test: npm run build && npm run update && npm run invoke && npm run logs
